main.name: Hemant Kuruva
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe JavaScript.
main.additional: And yes, I clicked that pic --->
main.bio: Hi there! I am Hemant! I've been coding for over 10 years now since my high school. I am a passionate coder with 2 years of professional experience in design and development of Websites and Web Applications. With the experience of working for a large corporation, a startup, and as a freelance web developer, I am armed with an extensive understanding of SDLC on various levels in JavaScript ecosystem.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me by filling this form!

education.degree: Master of Engineering, Electrical and Computer Engineering

education.school: G. Pullaiah Colege of Engg. and Tech., Kurnool, AP, India

description.exp: Built software components for an IoT solution “Connected Retail 360” aimed at bringing online shopping experience to physical stores based on Azure IoT Best Practices. Responsible for architecting the project, DPS, developing the React-based Web Dashboard, building C/C++ software for IoT devices and tracking the project.
Responsible for building a JS-based web application for Data Migration from a legacy business system to a new system. Also responsible for troubleshooting and monitoring project.

description.projname: Performance Engineering Project for Black Friday
description.exp: Worked on a Performance Engineering and Testing project for Business. Responsible for developing jMeter scripts in JavaScript, troubleshooting and monitoring project &c.

Worked as a Senior Developer for MC, an NY-based startup aimed at developing a Smartphone App/Platform for artists to collaborate live. Responsible for developing a React-based Admin Dashboard and tracking and monitoring the React Native-based Mobile App Development (Code reviews, PRs, Project Planning &c.
Taught C/C++ to students of 12-17 age, programmed robots based on Arduino platform, developed games based on Python, OpenCV &c.
